page.title: 07Games children play
page.content: In school we play {rounders, two balls and{1,2,3,}and out of school we play {hide and seek. To play {rounders }you need about nine people, one bowls, one bats and the rest are fielders. The bowler throws the ball, the batter bats the ball and if a fielder catches the ball they are out. Then the next person goes to bat. To play {1,2,3 }you can have as many people as you want as long as it's more than one. You need one ball. One person throws the ball up and if it bounces more than three times they are out, or if the other person catches it they are out. To play {hide and seek }you need at least two people. One counts and the others hide and if the one who counts sees the one who hides they run to the den and say "Denny 1,2,3," and then they will be "on".
